body:
Hey guys! This is my first ever map on Avicus! It is completely made by me and I would like to give thanks to everyone that gave some ounce of inspiration.

Credits:
Work: MLGtino
Building: MLGtino
Idea: MLGtino

Now, the YAML is currently being created. It will be up soon, I promise.
And now, time for the screenshots!
http://imgur.com/WtIWeg5,sILg9rt,1LZWCjw#0
Give me feedback please! I worked very hard on this, although constructive criticism would be extremely helpful and highly appreciated.

Whoa, that's one of the best maps i've ever seen! I love your detail, the combination of blocks you used and everything about it! but it might be a bit too big.. oh well. +1!!!
BEST MAP

replies.body:
I am so freaking excited for this map.  It has some of the best block variety and combinations in the best style, although the map may be a bit too large.  The gameplay on it looks fantastic!

+1,337,420.69
